title: Bko1234
author: Bko1234
content: I need to purchase a car used as mine broke down and cannot afford to buy one.I will repay weekly of €291 each Friday im paidI have no collateral…I urgently need help please USDT TRC20 wallet address TEpSXUDZRkoYZVCcx6kgmd5iXLy6EewCJJ

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: OP, you cannot get such a loan here without proper collateral, especially as a newbie. You might want to consider building up your reputation first, but brace yourself, it is a marathon, not a sprint. In the meantime, investing in a good old bike could be a solid plan!

comments.author: zazarb
comments.body: Did you register on the crypto forum just to get a loan? It's a very strange decision..

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.created_time: September 16, 2023, 10:37:19 PMLast edit: September 17, 2023, 11:30:27 AM by Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: If you can manage to raise €291 on each Friday you are paid or €3500 in 3 months. This means you have a job somewhere that is paying. Why not opt for an Employee Loan or Salary loan in your locality. I think it's far more realistic than expecting a stranger to get you a €2500 non-collateral loan

comments.author: BabyBandit
comments.created_time: September 19, 2023, 01:38:56 AMLast edit: September 19, 2023, 10:14:15 PM by BabyBandit
comments.body: Sure.... I send you the money. BTW: Don't bother about paying back, I give you this help for free since you seen to be such an honest and good guy, I feel for you bro!

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: Quote from: BabyBandit on September 19, 2023, 01:38:56 AMSure.... I send you the money. BTW: Don't bother about paying back & give you this help for free since you seen to be such an honest and good guy, I feel for you bro! A really nice joke man! But, in actual no one is going to lend him a cent. First of all he's a newbie members and secondly he has no collateral for the loan. Such users always come up with similar stories in order to take advantage of the generosity of the lenders, but now we know their tactics and they won't get loans from this forum.

Public Transport) - buy a scooter or push bike and save the money.Better still, fix your car!

You are correct, he should go to the bank or elsewhere using the car as collateral either to fix the existing car or to buy another. Until then, public transport will have to suffice.
